channel.title: sleep on Kamil Pro
channel.description: Recent content in sleep on Kamil Pro

item.title: Overloaded
item.description: Recently I’ve been writing about information overload. That we should avoid it, select only the best information. Oh well, I have overloaded myself recently. I slept 24 hours over the last 2 days! From 8 PM till 8AM. Children don’t sleep that much. My last 2 days had been like: Wake up, shower, work, coffee, home, dinner, coffee, sleep. Exciting, isn’t it? For the past 2 days my memory was like ROM – Read Only Memory – mission was to think clearly.
